pullRequest.title: QACI-139 Add Payara Samples to PR tests (public Jenkins)
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
New Feature for public Jenkins
Added new Payara Samples stage to public jenkins, PRs will be tested against Payara Samples to catch any test failures at the PR stage.
Testing
New tests
Payara Samples added to PR testing.
Testing Performed
Ran Jenkins script against PR #4584 - No specific reason why this PR
Testing Environment
Public Jenkins
